544620.name: ALICE VR - Developer Diaries and Wallpapers
544620.description:
Unique videos in which the developers share their vision for the game, talk about their inspirations and the new challenges that came with creating video game for VR.
Take a look behind the scenes of the production of Alice VR!

Also in this package you’ll find a set of eight exclusive wallpapers, created by the developers to best represent the atmosphere of their game. All are in 1080p resolution and look stunning on all screens.

All files will download to your game's installation directory.
544620.supported_languages:
英语, 波兰语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
